title: Camembert and broccoli pancakes
ingredients: ['115g (4 oz) plain flour', '2 eggs, beaten', '250ml (8½ fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '4 tsp sunflower oil', '15g (½ oz) Parmesan cheese, freshly grated', 'sprigs of fresh flat-leaf parsley to garnish', 'Tomato sauce', '1 onion, chopped', '1 garlic clove, chopped', '1 can chopped tomatoes, about 400 g pinch of sugar', '2 tbsp chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley', 'Camembert and broccoli filling', '250g (8½ oz) broccoli, broken into tiny florets', '150g (5½ oz) Camembert cheese, diced', '4 tbsp quark cheese', 'salt and pepper']
